Text: I appreciate having an FLAC option and all, but is there any way we can just get an mp3 version. 400mb is a bit much for what i can store
@paoskowe I just uploaded an MP3 -V0 version of this. Go check it out, and let me know if you want a 320kbps version. ;)
Good job Pipsqk, a V0 MP3 version should keep the lossy fans happy. :)
